item.title: Paranoid Android: How to fix the Safe Headset Volume bug
item.author: mail@c-m-l.net (Christian Humm)
item.description: At the moment I am running the Custom Rom Paranoid Android on my smartphone (a Nexus 4). Normally this is a fairly stable rom, with some nice features like Hover or Peek and a well-designed UI. However, in the latest version, 4.4 RC 1, there is an annoying bug: As soon as you listen to music via a headset and try to raise the volume over the so-called “Safe Headset Volume” Android reboots.
